segment.source: Provider Policies Results Pane
segment.target: Provider Policies Results Pane

segment.source: Provider Policies Results Pane
segment.target: Provider Policies Results Pane

segment.source: Provider Policies Results Pane
segment.target: Provider Policies Results Pane

segment.source: The Provider Policies Results pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console displays a list of the available provider policies.
segment.target: The Provider Policies Results pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console displays a list of the available provider policies.

segment.source: Right-click any provider policy to display the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click any provider policy to display the following elements.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: This menu item enables you to delete a provider policy from the Results pane.
segment.target: This menu item enables you to delete a provider policy from the Results pane.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: This menu item enables you to change the name of a provider policy in the Results pane.
segment.target: This menu item enables you to change the name of a provider policy in the Results pane.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: This menu item displays the Properties dialog box for the selected provider policy.
segment.target: This menu item displays the Properties dialog box for the selected provider policy.

segment.source: The Properties dialog box has the following tabs:
segment.target: The Properties dialog box has the following tabs:

segment.source: General—Enables you to select the Manage client desktop using theManagement Console check box if you want to centrally manage shortcuts on the client desktops from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: General—Enables you to select the Manage client desktop using theManagement Console check box if you want to centrally manage shortcuts on the client desktops from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: If you choose to manage shortcuts from the console, you can select check boxes to refresh the desktop every time a user logs in and at intervals you specify.
segment.target: If you choose to manage shortcuts from the console, you can select check boxes to refresh the desktop every time a user logs in and at intervals you specify.

segment.source: Group Assignment—Enables you to add and remove user groups assigned to the provider policy.
segment.target: Group Assignment—Enables you to add and remove user groups assigned to the provider policy.

segment.source: Provider Pipeline—Enables you to specify the authentication required.
segment.target: Provider Pipeline—Enables you to specify the authentication required.

segment.source: Select the desired check boxes for Enforce Access Permission Settings, Log Usage Information, and Licensing.
segment.target: Select the desired check boxes for Enforce Access Permission Settings, Log Usage Information, and Licensing.

segment.source: If you select the Licensing check box, select Audit License Usage Only or Enforce License Policies from the drop-down list.
segment.target: If you select the Licensing check box, select Audit License Usage Only or Enforce License Policies from the drop-down list.

segment.source: The first option monitors license usage, while the second option strictly enforces your licensing policy.
segment.target: The first option monitors license usage, while the second option strictly enforces your licensing policy.

segment.source: Click Finish, and then read the prompt and click OK to continue.
segment.target: Click Finish, and then read the prompt and click OK to continue.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Right-click anywhere in the Results pane, except on a provider policy, to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click anywhere in the Results pane, except on a provider policy, to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Select this menu item to refresh the view of the provider policies.
segment.target: Select this menu item to refresh the view of the provider policies.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: With this menu item, you can create a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: With this menu item, you can create a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: This menu item lets you change the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: This menu item lets you change the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: Arrange/Line Up Icons
segment.target: Arrange/Line Up Icons

segment.source: These menu items can be used to change how the icons are displayed in the Results pane.
segment.target: These menu items can be used to change how the icons are displayed in the Results pane.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Server Management Console: Provider Policies Node
segment.target: Server Management Console: Provider Policies Node
